verses.verse: ALEPH. Blessed<WH835> are the undefiled<WH8549> in the way,<WH1870> who walk<WH1980> in the law<WH8451> of the LORD.<WH3068>
Blessed<WH835> are they that keep<WH5341> his testimonies,<WH5713> and that seek<WH1875> him with the whole<WH3605> heart.<WH3820>
They also<WH637> do<WH6466> no<WH3808> iniquity:<WH5766> they walk<WH1980> in his ways.<WH1870>
You have commanded<WH6680> us to keep<WH8104> your precepts<WH6490> diligently.<WH3966>
O that my ways<WH1870> were directed<WH3559> to keep<WH8104> your statutes!<WH2706>
Then<WH227> shall I not be ashamed,<WH954> when I have respect<WH5027> to all<WH3605> your commandments.<WH4687>
I will praise<WH3034> you with uprightness<WH3476> of heart,<WH3824> when I shall have learned<WH3925> your righteous<WH6664> judgments.<WH4941>
I will keep<WH8104> your statutes:<WH2706> O forsake<WH5800> me not utterly.<WH3966>
BETH. Wherewithal<WH4100> shall a young<WH5288> man cleanse<WH2135> his way?<WH734> by taking heed<WH8104> thereto according to your word.<WH1697>
With my whole<WH3605> heart<WH3820> have I sought<WH1875> you: O let me not wander<WH7686> from your commandments.<WH4687>
Your word<WH565> have I hid<WH6845> in my heart,<WH3820> that I might not sin<WH2398> against you.
Blessed<WH1288> are you, O LORD:<WH3068> teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
With my lips<WH8193> have I declared<WH5608> all<WH3605> the judgments<WH4941> of your mouth.<WH6310>
I have rejoiced<WH7797> in the way<WH1870> of your testimonies,<WH5715> as much as in all<WH3605> riches.<WH1952>
I will meditate<WH7878> in your precepts,<WH6490> and have respect<WH5027> to your ways.<WH734>
I will delight<WH8173> myself in your statutes:<WH2708> I will not forget<WH7911> your word.<WH1697>
GIMEL. Deal<WH1580> bountifully<WH1580> with your servant,<WH5650> that I may live,<WH2421> and keep<WH8104> your word.<WH1697>
Open<WH1540> you my eyes,<WH5869> that I may behold<WH5027> wondrous<WH6381> things out of your law.<WH8451>
I am a stranger<WH1616> in the earth:<WH776> hide<WH5641> not your commandments<WH4687> from me.
My soul<WH5315> breaks<WH1638> for the longing<WH8375> that it has to your judgments<WH4941> at all<WH3605> times.<WH6256>
You have rebuked<WH1605> the proud<WH2086> that are cursed,<WH779> which do err<WH7686> from your commandments.<WH4687>
Remove<WH1556> from me reproach<WH2781> and contempt;<WH937> for I have kept<WH5341> your testimonies.<WH5713>
Princes<WH8269> also<WH1571> did sit<WH3427> and speak<WH1696> against me: but your servant<WH5650> did meditate<WH7878> in your statutes.<WH2706>
Your testimonies<WH5713> also are my delight<WH8191> and my counsellors.<WH6098>
My soul<WH5315> sticks<WH1692> to the dust:<WH6083> quicken<WH2421> you me according to your word.<WH1697>
I have declared<WH5608> my ways,<WH1870> and you heard<WH6030> me: teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
Make me to understand<WH995> the way<WH1870> of your precepts:<WH6490> so shall I talk<WH7878> of your wondrous<WH6381> works.
My soul<WH5315> melts<WH1811> for heaviness:<WH8424> strengthen<WH6965> you me according to your word.<WH1697>
Remove<WH5493> from me the way<WH1870> of lying:<WH8267> and grant<WH5414> me your law<WH8451> graciously.<WH2603>
I have chosen<WH977> the way<WH1870> of truth:<WH530> your judgments<WH4941> have I laid<WH7737> before me.
I have stuck<WH1692> to your testimonies:<WH5715> O LORD,<WH3068> put me not to shame.<WH954>
I will run<WH7323> the way<WH1870> of your commandments,<WH4687> when<WH3588> you shall enlarge<WH7337> my heart.<WH3820>
HE. Teach<WH3384> me, O LORD,<WH3068> the way<WH1870> of your statutes;<WH2706> and I shall keep<WH5341> it to the end.<WH6118>
Give me understanding,<WH995> and I shall keep<WH5341> your law;<WH8451> yes, I shall observe<WH8104> it with my whole<WH3605> heart.<WH3820>
Make me to go<WH1869> in the path<WH5410> of your commandments;<WH4687> for therein do I delight.<WH2654>
Incline<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> to your testimonies,<WH5715> and not to covetousness.<WH1215>
Turn<WH5674> away my eyes<WH5869> from beholding<WH7200> vanity;<WH7723> and quicken<WH2421> you me in your way.<WH1870>
Establish<WH6965> your word<WH565> to your servant,<WH5650> who<WH834> is devoted to your fear.<WH3374>
Turn<WH5674> away my reproach<WH2781> which<WH834> I fear:<WH3025> for your judgments<WH4941> are good.<WH2896>
Behold,<WH2009> I have longed<WH8373> after your precepts:<WH6490> quicken<WH2421> me in your righteousness.<WH6666>
VAU. Let your mercies<WH2617> come<WH935> also to me, O LORD,<WH3068> even your salvation,<WH8668> according to your word.<WH565>
So shall I have with which<WH1697> to answer<WH6030> him that reproaches<WH2778> me: for I trust<WH982> in your word.<WH1697>
And take<WH5337> not the word<WH1697> of truth<WH571> utterly<WH3966> out of my mouth;<WH6310> for I have hoped<WH3176> in your judgments.<WH4941>
So shall I keep<WH8104> your law<WH8451> continually<WH8548> for ever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>
And I will walk<WH1980> at liberty:<WH7342> for I seek<WH1875> your precepts.<WH6490>
I will speak<WH1696> of your testimonies<WH5713> also before<WH5048> kings,<WH4428> and will not be ashamed.<WH954>
And I will delight<WH8173> myself in your commandments,<WH4687> which<WH834> I have loved.<WH157>
My hands<WH3709> also will I lift<WH5375> up to your commandments,<WH4687> which<WH834> I have loved;<WH157> and I will meditate<WH7878> in your statutes.<WH2706>
Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> to your servant,<WH5650> on which<WH834> you have caused me to hope.<WH3176>
This<WH2063> is my comfort<WH5162> in my affliction:<WH6040> for your word<WH565> has quickened<WH2421> me.
The proud<WH2086> have had me greatly<WH3966> in derision:<WH3887> yet have I not declined<WH5186> from your law.<WH8451>
I remembered<WH2142> your judgments<WH4941> of old,<WH5769> O LORD;<WH3068> and have comforted<WH5162> myself.
Horror<WH2152> has taken<WH270> hold<WH270> on me because of the wicked<WH7563> that forsake<WH5800> your law.<WH8451>
Your statutes<WH2706> have been<WH1961> my songs<WH2158> in the house<WH1004> of my pilgrimage.<WH4033>
I have remembered<WH2142> your name,<WH8034> O LORD,<WH3068> in the night,<WH3915> and have kept<WH8104> your law.<WH8451>
This<WH2063> I had,<WH1961> because<WH3588> I kept<WH5341> your precepts.<WH6490>
CHETH. You are my portion,<WH2506> O LORD:<WH3068> I have said<WH559> that I would keep<WH8104> your words.<WH1697>
I entreated<WH2470> your favor<WH6440> with my whole<WH3605> heart:<WH3820> be merciful<WH2603> to me according to your word.<WH565>
I thought<WH2803> on my ways,<WH1870> and turned<WH7725> my feet<WH7272> to your testimonies.<WH5713>
I made haste,<WH2363> and delayed<WH4102> not to keep<WH8104> your commandments.<WH4687>
The bands<WH2256> of the wicked<WH7563> have robbed<WH5749> me: but I have not forgotten<WH7911> your law.<WH8451>
At midnight<WH2676> <WH3915> I will rise<WH6965> to give thanks<WH3034> to you because<WH5921> of your righteous<WH6664> judgments.<WH4941>
I am a companion<WH2270> of all<WH3605> them that fear<WH3372> you, and of them that keep<WH8104> your precepts.<WH6490>
The earth,<WH776> O LORD,<WH3068> is full<WH4390> of your mercy:<WH2617> teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
You have dealt<WH6213> well<WH2896> with your servant,<WH5650> O LORD,<WH3068> according to your word.<WH1697>
Teach<WH3925> me good<WH2898> judgment<WH2940> and knowledge:<WH1847> for I have believed<WH539> your commandments.<WH4687>
Before<WH2962> I was afflicted<WH6031> I went<WH7683> astray:<WH7683> but now<WH6258> have I kept<WH8104> your word.<WH565>
You are good,<WH2896> and do good;<WH2895> teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
The proud<WH2086> have forged<WH2950> a lie<WH3576> against<WH5921> me: but I will keep<WH5341> your precepts<WH6490> with my whole<WH3605> heart.<WH3820>
Their heart<WH3820> is as fat<WH2954> as grease;<WH2459> but I delight<WH8173> in your law.<WH8451>
It is good<WH2896> for me that I have been afflicted;<WH6031> that I might learn<WH3925> your statutes.<WH2706>
The law<WH8451> of your mouth<WH6310> is better<WH2896> to me than thousands<WH505> of gold<WH2091> and silver.<WH3701>
Your hands<WH3027> have made<WH6213> me and fashioned<WH3559> me: give me understanding,<WH995> that I may learn<WH3925> your commandments.<WH4687>
They that fear<WH3373> you will be glad<WH8056> when they see<WH7200> me; because<WH3588> I have hoped<WH3176> in your word.<WH1697>
I know,<WH3045> O LORD,<WH3068> that your judgments<WH4941> are right,<WH6664> and that you in faithfulness<WH530> have afflicted<WH6031> me.
Let, I pray<WH4994> you, your merciful<WH2617> kindness<WH2617> be for my comfort,<WH5162> according to your word<WH565> to your servant.<WH5650>
Let your tender mercies<WH7356> come<WH935> to me, that I may live:<WH2421> for your law<WH8451> is my delight.<WH8191>
Let the proud<WH2086> be ashamed;<WH954> for they dealt perversely<WH5791> with me without<WH8267> a cause:<WH8267> but I will meditate<WH7878> in your precepts.<WH6490>
Let those that fear<WH3373> you turn<WH7725> to me, and those that have known<WH3045> your testimonies.<WH5713>
Let my heart<WH3820> be sound<WH8549> in your statutes;<WH2706> that I be not ashamed.<WH954>
CAPH. My soul<WH5315> faints<WH3615> for your salvation:<WH8668> but I hope<WH3176> in your word.<WH1697>
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for your word,<WH565> saying,<WH559> When<WH4970> will you comfort<WH5162> me?
For I am become<WH1961> like a bottle<WH4997> in the smoke;<WH7008> yet do I not forget<WH7911> your statutes.<WH2706>
How<WH4100> many are the days<WH3117> of your servant?<WH5650> when<WH4970> will you execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> on them that persecute<WH7291> me?
The proud<WH2086> have dig<WH3738> pits<WH7882> for me, which<WH834> are not after your law.<WH8451>
All<WH3605> your commandments<WH4687> are faithful:<WH530> they persecute<WH7291> me wrongfully;<WH8267> help<WH5826> you me.
They had almost<WH4592> consumed<WH3615> me on earth;<WH776> but I forsook<WH5800> not your precepts.<WH6490>
Quicken<WH2421> me after your loving kindness;<WH2617> so shall I keep<WH8104> the testimony<WH5715> of your mouth.<WH6310>
For ever,<WH5769> O LORD,<WH3068> your word<WH1697> is settled<WH5324> in heaven.<WH8064>
Your faithfulness<WH530> is to all generations:<WH1755> you have established<WH3559> the earth,<WH776> and it stays.<WH5975>
They continue<WH5975> this day<WH3117> according to your ordinances:<WH4941> for all<WH3605> are your servants.<WH5650>
Unless<WH3884> your law<WH8451> had been my delights,<WH8191> I should then<WH227> have perished<WH6> in my affliction.<WH6040>
I will never<WH5769> <WH3808> forget<WH7911> your precepts:<WH6490> for with them you have quickened<WH2421> me.
I am yours, save<WH3467> me: for I have sought<WH1875> your precepts.<WH6490>
The wicked<WH7563> have waited<WH6960> for me to destroy<WH6> me: but I will consider<WH995> your testimonies.<WH5713>
I have seen<WH7200> an end<WH7093> of all<WH3605> perfection:<WH8502> but your commandment<WH4687> is exceeding<WH3966> broad.<WH7342>
MEM. O how<WH4100> I love<WH157> your law!<WH8451> it is my meditation<WH7881> all<WH3605> the day.<WH3117>
You through your commandments<WH4687> have made me wiser<WH2449> than my enemies:<WH341> for they are ever<WH5769> with me.
I have more understanding<WH7919> than all<WH3605> my teachers:<WH3925> for your testimonies<WH5715> are my meditation.<WH7881>
I understand<WH995> more than the ancients,<WH2204> because<WH3588> I keep<WH5341> your precepts.<WH6490>
I have refrained<WH3607> my feet<WH7272> from every<WH3605> evil<WH7451> way,<WH734> that I might keep<WH8104> your word.<WH1697>
I have not departed<WH5493> from your judgments:<WH4941> for you have taught<WH3384> me.
How<WH4100> sweet<WH4452> are your words<WH565> to my taste!<WH2441> yes, sweeter than honey<WH1706> to my mouth!<WH6310>
Through your precepts<WH6490> I get understanding:<WH995> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I hate<WH8130> every<WH3605> false<WH8267> way.<WH734>
NUN. Your word<WH1697> is a lamp<WH5216> to my feet,<WH7272> and a light<WH216> to my path.<WH5410>
I have sworn,<WH7650> and I will perform<WH6965> it, that I will keep<WH8104> your righteous<WH6664> judgments.<WH4941>
I am afflicted<WH6031> very<WH5704> <WH3966> much:<WH3966> quicken<WH2421> me, O LORD,<WH3068> according to your word.<WH1697>
Accept,<WH7521> I beseech<WH4994> you, the freewill<WH5071> offerings of my mouth,<WH6310> O LORD,<WH3068> and teach<WH3925> me your judgments.<WH4941>
My soul<WH5315> is continually<WH8548> in my hand:<WH3709> yet do I not forget<WH7911> your law.<WH8451>
The wicked<WH7563> have laid<WH5414> a snare<WH6341> for me: yet I erred<WH8582> not from your precepts.<WH6490>
Your testimonies<WH5715> have I taken as an heritage<WH5157> for ever:<WH5769> for they are the rejoicing<WH8342> of my heart.<WH3820>
I have inclined<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> to perform<WH6213> your statutes<WH2706> always,<WH5769> even to the end.<WH6118>
SAMECH. I hate<WH8130> vain thoughts:<WH5588> but your law<WH8451> do I love.<WH157>
You are my hiding<WH5643> place and my shield:<WH4043> I hope<WH3176> in your word.<WH1697>
Depart<WH5493> from me, you evildoers:<WH7489> for I will keep<WH5341> the commandments<WH4687> of my God.<WH430>
Uphold<WH5564> me according to your word,<WH565> that I may live:<WH2421> and let me not be ashamed<WH954> of my hope.<WH7664>
Hold<WH5582> you me up, and I shall be safe:<WH3467> and I will have respect<WH8159> to your statutes<WH2706> continually.<WH8548>
You have trodden<WH5541> down all<WH3605> them that err<WH7686> from your statutes:<WH2706> for their deceit<WH8649> is falsehood.<WH8267>
You put<WH7673> away all<WH3605> the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> like dross:<WH5509> therefore<WH3651> I love<WH157> your testimonies.<WH5713>
My flesh<WH1320> trembles<WH5568> for fear<WH6343> of you; and I am afraid<WH3372> of your judgments.<WH4941>
I have done<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice:<WH6664> leave<WH5117> me not to my oppressors.<WH6231>
Be surety<WH6148> for your servant<WH5650> for good:<WH2896> let not the proud<WH2086> oppress<WH6231> me.
My eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for your salvation,<WH3444> and for the word<WH565> of your righteousness.<WH6664>
Deal<WH6213> with your servant<WH5650> according to your mercy,<WH2617> and teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
I am your servant;<WH5650> give me understanding,<WH995> that I may know<WH3045> your testimonies.<WH5713>
It is time<WH6256> for you, LORD,<WH3068> to work:<WH6213> for they have made void<WH6565> your law.<WH8451>
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I love<WH157> your commandments<WH4687> above gold;<WH2091> yes, above fine gold.<WH6337>
Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I esteem all<WH3605> your precepts<WH6490> concerning all<WH3605> things to be right;<WH3474> and I hate<WH8130> every<WH3605> false<WH8267> way.<WH734>
PE. Your testimonies<WH5715> are wonderful:<WH6382> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> does my soul<WH5315> keep<WH5341> them.
The entrance<WH6608> of your words<WH1697> gives light;<WH216> it gives understanding<WH995> to the simple.<WH6612>
I opened<WH6473> my mouth,<WH6310> and panted:<WH7602> for I longed<WH2968> for your commandments.<WH4687>
Look<WH6437> you on me, and be merciful<WH2603> to me, as you use<WH4941> to do to those that love<WH157> your name.<WH8034>
Order<WH3559> my steps<WH6471> in your word:<WH565> and let not any<WH3605> iniquity<WH205> have dominion<WH7980> over me.
Deliver<WH6299> me from the oppression<WH6233> of man:<WH120> so<WH3602> will I keep<WH8104> your precepts.<WH6490>
Make your face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> on your servant;<WH5650> and teach<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
Rivers<WH6388> of waters<WH4325> run<WH3381> down my eyes,<WH5869> because<WH5921> they keep<WH8104> not your law.<WH8451>
TZADDI. Righteous<WH6662> are you, O LORD,<WH3068> and upright<WH3477> are your judgments.<WH4941>
Your testimonies<WH5713> that you have commanded<WH6680> are righteous<WH6664> and very<WH3966> faithful.<WH530>
My zeal<WH7068> has consumed<WH6789> me, because<WH3588> my enemies<WH6862> have forgotten<WH7911> your words.<WH1697>
Your word<WH565> is very<WH3966> pure:<WH6884> therefore your servant<WH5650> loves<WH157> it.
I am small<WH6810> and despised:<WH959> yet do not I forget<WH7911> your precepts.<WH6490>
Your righteousness<WH6666> is an everlasting<WH5769> righteousness,<WH6664> and your law<WH8451> is the truth.<WH571>
Trouble<WH6862> and anguish<WH4689> have taken<WH4672> hold<WH4672> on me: yet your commandments<WH4687> are my delights.<WH8191>
The righteousness<WH6664> of your testimonies<WH5715> is everlasting:<WH5769> give me understanding,<WH995> and I shall live.<WH2421>
KOPH. I cried<WH7121> with my whole heart;<WH3820> hear<WH6030> me, O LORD:<WH3068> I will keep<WH5341> your statutes.<WH2706>
I cried<WH7121> to you; save<WH3467> me, and I shall keep<WH8104> your testimonies.<WH5713>
I prevented<WH6923> the dawning<WH5399> of the morning, and cried:<WH7768> I hoped<WH3176> in your word.<WH1697>
My eyes<WH5869> prevent<WH6923> the night watches,<WH821> that I might meditate<WH7878> in your word.<WH565>
Hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> according to your loving kindness:<WH2617> O LORD,<WH3068> quicken<WH2421> me according to your judgment.<WH4941>
They draw near<WH7126> that follow<WH7291> after mischief:<WH2154> they are far<WH7368> from your law.<WH8451>
You are near,<WH7138> O LORD;<WH3068> and all<WH3605> your commandments<WH4687> are truth.<WH571>
Concerning your testimonies,<WH5713> I have known<WH3045> of old<WH6924> that you have founded<WH3245> them for ever.<WH5769>
Consider<WH7200> my affliction,<WH6040> and deliver<WH2502> me: for I do not forget<WH7911> your law.<WH8451>
Plead<WH7378> my cause,<WH7379> and deliver<WH1350> me: quicken<WH2421> me according to your word.<WH565>
Salvation<WH3444> is far<WH7350> from the wicked:<WH7563> for they seek<WH1875> not your statutes.<WH2706>
Great<WH7227> are your tender mercies,<WH7356> O LORD:<WH3068> quicken<WH2421> me according to your judgments.<WH4941>
Many<WH7227> are my persecutors<WH7291> and my enemies;<WH6862> yet do I not decline<WH5186> from your testimonies.<WH5715>
I beheld<WH7200> the transgressors,<WH898> and was grieved;<WH6962> because<WH834> they kept<WH8104> not your word.<WH565>
Consider<WH7200> how<WH3588> I love<WH157> your precepts:<WH6490> quicken<WH2421> me, O LORD,<WH3068> according to your loving kindness.<WH2617>
Your word<WH1697> is true<WH571> from the beginning:<WH7218> and every<WH3605> one of your righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941> endures for ever.<WH5769>
Princes<WH8269> have persecuted<WH7291> me without<WH2600> a cause:<WH2600> but my heart<WH3820> stands in awe<WH6342> of your word.<WH1697>
I rejoice<WH7797> at<WH5921> your word,<WH565> as one that finds<WH4672> great<WH7227> spoil.<WH7998>
I hate<WH8130> and abhor<WH8581> lying:<WH8267> but your law<WH8451> do I love.<WH157>
Seven<WH7651> times a day<WH3117> do I praise<WH1984> you because<WH5921> of your righteous<WH6664> judgments.<WH4941>
Great<WH7227> peace<WH7965> have they which love<WH157> your law:<WH8451> and nothing<WH369> shall offend<WH4383> them.
LORD,<WH3068> I have hoped<WH7663> for your salvation,<WH3444> and done<WH6213> your commandments.<WH4687>
My soul<WH5315> has kept<WH8104> your testimonies;<WH5713> and I love<WH157> them exceedingly.<WH3966>
I have kept<WH8104> your precepts<WH6490> and your testimonies:<WH5713> for all<WH3605> my ways<WH1870> are before<WH5048> you.
Let my cry<WH7440> come<WH7126> near<WH7126> before<WH6440> you, O LORD:<WH3068> give me understanding<WH995> according to your word.<WH1697>
Let my supplication<WH8467> come<WH935> before<WH6440> you: deliver<WH5337> me according to your word.<WH565>
My lips<WH8193> shall utter<WH5042> praise,<WH8416> when<WH3588> you have taught<WH3925> me your statutes.<WH2706>
My tongue<WH3956> shall speak<WH6030> of your word:<WH565> for all<WH3605> your commandments<WH4687> are righteousness.<WH6664>
Let your hand<WH3027> help<WH5826> me; for I have chosen<WH977> your precepts.<WH6490>
I have longed<WH8373> for your salvation,<WH3444> O LORD;<WH3068> and your law<WH8451> is my delight.<WH8191>
Let my soul<WH5315> live,<WH2421> and it shall praise<WH1984> you; and let your judgments<WH4941> help<WH5826> me.
I have gone<WH8582> astray<WH8582> like a lost<WH6> sheep;<WH7716> seek<WH1245> your servant;<WH5650> for I do not forget<WH7911> your commandments.<WH4687>
